titles.title: A bill to modify the boundaries for a certain empowerment zone designation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3391-3392)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
3/20/2007--Introduced.
Includes all of Aroostook County, Maine, within the Aroostook County Empowerment Zone (for Department of Agriculture empowerment zone purposes).
